analysis.description:
HDK_Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/32/0xa0f075d5473467e4a8c82e2c58c4871bcff3a699.sol#307-323) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/32/0xa0f075d5473467e4a8c82e2c58c4871bcff3a699.sol#321)

HDK_Crowdsale.destroy (/unique_chucks/32/0xa0f075d5473467e4a8c82e2c58c4871bcff3a699.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/32/0xa0f075d5473467e4a8c82e2c58c4871bcff3a699.sol)
